description: Detects a possible process memory dump that uses the white-listed filename like TrolleyExpress.exe as a way to dump the lsass process memory without Microsoft Defender interference Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Unlikely, since these tools shouldn't access lsass.exe at all
name: LSASS Access from White-Listed Processes
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\lsass.exe AND process.executable:(*\\TrolleyExpress.exe OR *\\ProcessDump.exe OR *\\dump64.exe) AND winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:(*10 OR *30 OR *50 OR *70 OR *90 OR *B0 OR *D0 OR *F0 OR *18 OR *38 OR *58 OR *78 OR *98 OR *B8 OR *D8 OR *F8 OR *1A OR *3A OR *5A OR *7A OR *9A OR *BA OR *DA OR *FA OR *0x14C2 OR *FF))
